boardgame.name: Primordial Soup
Ursuppe
boardgame.description: In Primordial Soup each player controls a species of primitive _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;amoeboid_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; organisms. Together these species form an ecosystem where each feeds on the excreta of the others. To win a player must guide the evolution of their species to increase their population and the sophistication of their genes._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Each round consists of various phases. Firstly each organism must move (either by drifting or under its own power) and then feed. Then the environment undergoes a random change which changes the direction of drift and may force some organisms to give up genes. Then the species may buy new genes, and then may reproduce. At this point some organisms will die and finally each species is scored. This is repeated until either a species gets at least 42 points or the environment cards are exhausted._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The possible genes include genes for enhanced control of movement, more efficient metabolism, more efficient reproduction, attack and defence._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Expanded by:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Primordial Soup: Freshly Spiced_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

never played +++++ first german edition +++++ will be shipped with insurance only +++++ payment for germany : personal pick up in berlin or bank transfer +++++ payment for usa and canada : paypal or cash (by letter, exchanged already into euros) or bank transfer +++++ payment for asia and australia: cash (by letter, exchanged already into euros) or bank transfer +++++ countries, that have no euro : cash (by letter, exchanged already into euros) or bank transfer +++++ payment for european countries, that have euro : cash (by letter) or bank transfer (wich is cost-free !) +++++ payment for european countries, that have no euro : cash (by letter, exchanged already into euros) or bank transfer +++++ for all : no checks ! +++++ foreign buyers beware : german postal sadly is very expensive for foreign packages (about 18 - 45 euros, it depends on, where the package has to be shipped), pleask at for prices, befor you buy !) +++++ shipping inside germany will cost 8 euros

auction for jaybarlekamp includes Primordial Soup and Gloom.

Z-Man Games (ZMG 7001) Known as Ursuppe, this Doris and Frank game (Frank_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Zoo) took second place in 1998_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Deutscher Spielepreis and rates highly on boardgamegeek.com. You control a tribe of amoebas living in Earth_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s past trying to survive in the Primordial Soup. At first, your amoebas drift along, eating the nutrients that are available, but soon you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll have to figure out how to get to the rapidly depleting supply of nutrients before your opponent_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s amoebas beat you to it. You will purchase rule-breaking Gene cards to give your amoeba capabilities to be the top dog in the Soup. Some of these capabilities include more coordinated movement, longevity, aggression, etc. The player who keeps his amoebas alive and balances the use of his or her Gene cards will reign in the Soup.
Reserved for Steve Wardell (Khedron)
